courseDescription:
Do you want to develop a career in programming and computer coding? With the world switching more and more towards technology, you apply computer coding to so many things around us. This course starts with a brief introduction to the Python language. We explore some basic information regarding the language and key features of the platform. We will also examine the online environment where the user can write and run code and an interface overview.

Need help to figure out where to start your journey toward learning Python? We will take you through the critical components of Python step-by-step. In detail, we review the syntax and symbols used for the language's essential functions and operations. We will look at how to perform arithmetic functions in Python and use different types of available collections. The course will also discuss control flow statements and their various types.

Programming languages are all about executing behaviors and implementing logic. This course will look at this aspect of Python as we work through objects and classes. We examine all these facets of Python, using examples to clarify your understanding of the concepts. With lucrative careers in programming at the forefront, the time is right to start your journey toward becoming a programmer. This course can be your guide toward that rewarding journey. So enroll now to become a Python programming expert today.
